result.arabic_text: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فِي جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
result.translation: 103. Kaadu meqe taamah miidaan kak daggooweeh, uma taamah miidaan kak yiqilsee mari, toysa woo mari sinni nafsi finqiseeh kasaarise maray Jahannam giráh addal waara kinnon.
